mapper.insert: insert into app_transaction( name, sex, phone, repairHouse, memo, bussinessType, status, createTime, uid ) values ( #{name}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{repairHouse}, #{memo}, #{bussinessType}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{uid} )
insert into app_transaction( bussinessType, phone, status, createTime ) values ( #{bussinessType}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{createTime} )
insert into app_transaction( bussinessType, name, phone, type, memo, createTime, status ) values ( #{bussinessType}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{createTime}, #{status} )
